dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Guh!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!  This is payback!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: We didn’t even touch Mr. Fluffy.  What the hell.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Well fine, but what about the others?!

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: Didn’t touch them either.  Get with the program, here.

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: You’re right, what we were doing to the monsters was wrong.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Wait, I need a minute here.

dialogue.Speaker: Agni
dialogue.Text: We’ll find a home for your friends.  Come on, bring Dr. G with you and let’s all go home.

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: That’s all well and good, but we still need to deal with the civilians.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Yeah… Okay.  I can stop the monsters.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: What was that about a park?
